message.entry: ADALM-PLUTO radio with serial number ''{0}'' has firmware version "{1}". You can continue using version "{1}", with the understanding that this release of the support package was tested with version "{2}". If you experience unexpected behavior while using version "{1}", we recommend installing version "{2}". To switch the firmware version to "{2}", {3} then click {4} to start the Hardware Setup App.
ensure that the simulation is stopped,
Specified center frequency is outside factory default range. To assign the center frequency to {0}, release the radio and click {1}. For more information, see help configurePlutoRadio.
Input X must be complex. PlutoSDR is optimized for I/Q (complex) signals. See documentation for more information.
